verbs.description: [ARG0: A conservative provocateur and supporter of President Donald Trump] [V: won] [ARG1: Virginia 's Republican primary] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-LOC: in the U.S. Senate race] , and he has promised to run a " vicious " campaign ...
A conservative provocateur and supporter of President Donald Trump won Virginia 's Republican primary Tuesday in the U.S. Senate race , and he [V: has] promised to run a " vicious " campaign ...
